title: New league client unable to launch error 0xc000012f
body: The new league client will not launch and I have reinstalled several times, updated drivers, and allowed changes to be made. It wont launch and says it has an error or my windows download from their website wasnt designed to run on windows. How can I fix this? It says LoL has a bad image. I'm almost certain it's something to do with the new client because I tried updating in alpha stage of the client and had the same problem. I just went back to the old client and now this update was forced and I can't play league now{{item:3070}}

replies.body: I left a comment on another page but long story short go to C drive (located in my documents, my computer), locate riot games folder, then into League of Legends folder, locate the file "LeagueClient" and if there's a messed up symbol or says error when you try to double left click on that DELETE IT. Then, a few files down is "lol.launcher" click that and it should run to the client, hit the LAUNCH button then it will do it's update. GOODLUCK!

Can you explain this a little better cause  the only thing i can find is leagueoflegends na installer in downloads. Ive already reset my pc while keeping personal files and i might just completely reset it or get a new pc if this wont work

Oh goodness you shouldn't have to go through all that! 

1.) Open "My Documents"
2.) On the left panel click "This Pc"
3.) Click now on the main menu "Local Disk C Drive"  (That's where games usually auto install unless when you originally installed your league you moved it into a different drive in that case find that drive.)
4.) Open the "Riot Games" folder
5.) Open "League of Legends" folder
6.) Scroll down until you locate the file called "LeagueClient" this is where my fix works, if the symbol beside that file is an "X" or when you right click on the file and "Error" pops up then this WILL help you. If not I'm not entirely sure. 
7.) DELETE THE "LEAGUECLIENT" FILE
8.) In the same folder, a few files down click "lol.launcher" and it should run the client. 
9.) From the client hit the LAUNCH button and voila!
Sir, thanks so much! I could kiss you right now
It actually worked, thanks a lot!
i ended up going threw a bunch of hopes and ended up seeing your comment yours was the only thing that ended up working thank you so much my friend  you are a {{item:3026}}
It seems to be working for a few people now I'm really glad I could help :) need the league addiction!

This windows error can happen if a security or permissions problem is messing up the install.  My suspicions that this is a security setting is further affirmed by that 0xc000012f error that can happen when it fails to locate or read a file.  I suggest going over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure nothing is blocking you from properly installing and launching League.  That should do it, but let me know if you have any issues.
can you explain to me because I cant play league of legends and I reinstalled, watched youtube nothing works it is driving me crazy and all it says is bad image something more}

Giraffe303
